Verses: 1 pazhudhum Avalatchanamumulla Yaadhoru Maattaiyaavadhu Aattaiyaavadhu Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Baliyidavendaam; Adhu Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aruvaruppaayirukkum.

2 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Kangalukku Munbaaga Endhap Purushanaavadhu Sthireeyaavadhu Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkira Vaasalgal Ondril Akkiramanjeydhu, Avarudaiya Udanbadikkaiyai Meeri,
3 naan Vilakkiyirukkira Vere Dhevargalaiyaavadhu Sandhirasooriyar Mudhalaana Vaanasenaigalaiyaavadhu Seviththu, Avaigalai Namaskarikkiradhaagak Kaanappattaal,
4 adhu Un Seviketka Unakku Arivikkappadumbodhu, Nee Adhai Nandraai Visaarikkakkadavaai; Adhu Mey Endrum, Appadippatta Aruvaruppu Isravelil Nadandhadhu Nichchayam Endrum Kandaayaanaal,
5 andha Akkiramaththaich Seydha Purushanaiyaavadhu Sthireeyaiyaavadhu Un Vaasalgalukku Veliye Kondupoi, Appadippattavargal Saagumbadi Kalleriyakkadavaai.
6 saavukkup Paaththiramaanavan Irandu Moondru Saatchigaludaiya Vaakkinaal Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan; Ore Saatchiyinudaiya Vaakkinaal Avan Kolaiseyyappadalaagaadhu.
7 avanaik Kolaiseygiradharkuch Saatchigaludaiya Kaigal Mundhiyum Ellaa Janangaludaiya Kaigal Pindhiyum Avanmel Iruppadhaaga; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkakkadavaai.

8 un Vaasalgalil Raththappazhigalaik Kuriththum, Viyaachchiyangalaik Kuriththum, Kaayampatta Sedhangalaikkuriththum Vazhakku Nerittu, Niyaayandheerppadhu Unakku Aridhaayirundhaal, Nee Ezhundhu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Therindhu Erpaduththina Sthaanaththirkup Poi,
9 leviyaraana Aasaariyaridaththilum Annaatkalil Irukkira Niyaayaadhibadhiyinidaththilum Visaarikkavendum; Niyaayam Innadhendru Avargal Unakku Arivippaargal.
10 karththar Therindhukonda Idaththilirundhu Avargal Unakku Arivikkum Theerppukku Nee Inangi, Avargal Unakku Vidhikkirabadi Seyyak Gavanamaayiruppaayaaga.
11 avargal Unakku Arivikkum Theerppai Vittu Valadhupuram Idadhupuram Saayaamal, Avargal Unakku Unarththum Piramaanaththinbadiyum, Unakkuch Sollum Niyaayaththeerppinbadiyum Seyyakkadavaai.

12 ange Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aaraadhanai Seyyumbadi Nirkira Aasaariyanudaiya Sollaiyaagilum, Niyaayaadhipadhiyinudaiya Sollaiyaagilum Kelaamal, Oruvan Idumpuseydhaal, Avan Saagakkadavan; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Isravelilirundhu Vilakkakkadavaai.
13 appozhudhu Janangal Ellaarum Adhaik Kettu, Bayandhu, Ini Idumbu Seyyaadhiruppaargal.

14 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththil Nee Poich Serndhu, Adhaich Sudhandhariththukkondu, Adhil Kudiyerinapin, Nee: Ennaich Sutrilum Irukkira Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Pola, Naanum Enakku Oru Raajaavai Erpaduththavendum Enbaayaanaal;

15 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Therindhu Kolbavanaiye Unakku Raajaavaaga Vaikkakkadavaai; Un Sagodhararukkullirukkira Oruvanaiye Unmel Raajaavaaga Erpaduththakkadavaai; Un Sagodharan Allaadha Anniyanai Raajaavaaga Erpaduththak Koodaadhu.

16 avan Anega Kudhiraigalaich Sambaadhiyaamalum, Anega Kudhiraigalaith Thanakkuch Sambaadhikkumbadikku Janangalaith Thirumba Egipthirkup Pogappannaamalum Irukkakkadavan; Ini Andha Vazhiyaai Neengal Thirumbippogavendaam Endru Karththar Ungalukkuch Solliyirukkiraare.
17 avan Irudhayam Pinvaangip Pogaadhabadi Avan Anegam Sthireegalaip Padaikkavendaam; Velliyum Ponnum Thanakku Migudhiyaaip Perugappannavum Vendaam.
18 avan Than Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkumbodhu, Avanudaiya Irudhayam Avan Sagodhararperil Mettimai Kollaamalum, Karpanaiyaivittu Valadhupuram Idadhupuram Saayaamalum,
19 indha Niyaayappiramaanaththin Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum, Indhak Kattalaigalaiyum Kaikkondu, Ivaigalin Badi Seyvadharkaagath Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhirukkumbadi Katrukkollumporuttu,

20 avan Leviyaraagiya Aasaariyaridaththilirukkira Niyaayappiramaana Noolaip Paarththu, Thanakkaaga Oru Piradhiyai Ezhudhi, Thannidaththil Vaiththukkondu, Than Jeevanulla Naalellaam Adhai Vaasikkakkadavan; Ippadich Seyvadhinaal, Thaanum Than Kumaararum Isravelin Naduve Thangal Raajyaththile Neediththu Vaazhuvaargal.
